section.heading: Pleading.
section.text: In a derivative action to enforce a right of a statutory trust, the complaint shall state with particularity the:

para.text: Date and content of the plaintiff’s demand and the trustees’ response to the demand; or
Reason the demand should be excused as futile.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
